nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION STRENGTHENS INTO TROPICAL STORM BERYL... ...EXPECTED TO STRENGTHEN INTO A HURRICANE AS IT APPROACHES THE WINDWARD ISLANDS...
summary:
...DEPRESSION STRENGTHENS INTO TROPICAL STORM BERYL... ...EXPECTED TO STRENGTHEN INTO A HURRICANE AS IT APPROACHES THE WINDWARD ISLANDS...
 As of 11:00 PM AST Fri Jun 28
 the center of Beryl was located near 9.3, -43.6
 with movement W at 18 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
